job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Join World Vision as Data Scientist


01 At a Glance 

  

Role:Data Scientist, Marketing

Experience level: Senior

Required experience: Predictive modeling, model monitoring/model ops,SQL,Python,descriptive statistics,exploratory statistics,information visualization

Preferred experience: Marketing analytics,statistics training

Location:Prefer Seattle (Federal Way, WA) base. Remote possible w/preference for Pacific NW base for ease of travel to the HQ office as needed post-pandemic.

Compensation Range:Your salary is important to you so it’s important to us. If you need the approximate range to inform your decision on whether to apply or not contact Scott using one of the ways below.

Benefits: Yes. Visit https://www.worldvision.org/about-us/job-opportunities/working-for-world-vision to learn more.

Company size: 900+ (World Vision USA) / 35,000 worldwide (World Vision International)  


02Join professionals with purpose 

At World Vision USA you’ll join people who are all-in to impact the lives of the world's most vulnerable children. Our recipe includes love of all people, fiscal responsibility, and targeting the root causes of poverty. Our purpose includes human transformation for the most vulnerable and for the donors who support them.

And the impact is real. Every day we see donors’ hearts draw closer to the heart God has for children, families, and communities affected by poverty and injustice. The work you'll do here will help make it possible that every 60 seconds a family gets water, a hungry child is fed, and a family gets the tools they need to overcome poverty.

03TheJob 

We are looking for aseasoneddata scientistwith a passion for applying machine learningand building solutionsthatinspireourdonorsandprovidea better life forhundreds ofthousands of children in100 countries.You will be joiningateam oftwo otherdata scientists who have been given executive level support toexpandmachine learningformarketingand fundraisinginitiatives.Responsibilities include: 

 

  • Helpingdefineour evolvingvisionand tacticsofmachine learning for all World Vision marketing functions.
  • Leveragingautomated machine learning, as well asprogramming,totakepredictive models from ideation to feature creation,training,and implementation.
  • Monitoring andmanaging models over timeto ensure we are continually putting our best foot forward for our faithful donors.
  • Serving asanalytical consultantsto our marketers by settingup andreadingmarket tests,producing actionable insights fromdeep-dive analyses, andapplying best practices ininformation visualization.
  • Applyingsound statisticsthat help the organization makereliabledata-drivendecisions.
  • KeepingChrist centralin our individual and corporate lives. Attendingand participatingin weekly devotions, chapel services, and regular prayer. 


04You Bring

 

  • Heart for servicebecause we are not just working with data, we are working with valuable donor dollars andimpactingthe livelihood ofthe world’s neediestchildren.
  • Team spiritbecause we try to learn from each person and function as a body of Christ, not a lone rangeror unicorn. Yet you also bring a“figure it out” attitudebecause you areanindependent and resourcefuladult.
  • Passion for continual learningbecause our industry,our organization,and the data science worldwillnever stop changing.
  • Creative problem solvingwith machine learning and the fortitude to follow through to the endbecauseour data and our projectswon’t beeasy.
  • Real-world experience in marketing data science(including digitalmarketing). This means you can build models, but have also wrestled with defining training sets, creating features,and monitoring models over timebecauseyou knowthe building part is only the tip of the iceberg.
  • Fluency inSQL and Pythonto pull and transform data, conduct descriptive analysis,and performmachine learning.There will be a lot of coding for sure and it won’t always be the glamorous machine learning type.
  • Familiaritywithautomated machine learningbecause we’rea non-profit trying to do more with less byembracingDatarobotto dothe work of 5x more people than weactually have.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skillsthat resonate with lay peoplebecauseyou’ll be working with marketers who put tremendous value in words and images.


05Where this job could take your career

World Vision USAis a part of the larger World Vision International partnership. Globally, we have nearly 35,000 staff working in nearly 100 countries. Just over 900 of us call World Vision USA home. You'll have opportunities to advance within our robust and talented group ofprofessionals as you continue to stretch and grow your career for the future.

06Let your work be your faith in action

Every day, nearly 16,000 children under the age of 5 die from preventable causes. Our call to action is urgent. That’s why we’re looking for someone who is ready to place their expertise behind helping the world’s most vulnerable children. Every data-driven decision made and donor experience optimized can help influence whether someone chooses to help today or not. If not you, then who?

07 Salary Range & Benefits 


Your salary is important to you so it’s important to us. If you need the approximate range to inform your decision on whether to apply or not contact Scott using one of the ways below.In addition, we have a robust and comprehensive benefits package to round out our total compensation package. Visit https://www.worldvision.org/about-us/job-opportunities/working-for-world-visionto learn more.

08To Apply


Click the Easy Apply button on this page. Still not sure? We'dreallyliketohear from you, even if it’s just to ask a question about the job. Text Scott in Talent Acquisition at 253-815-2843 or smcdiffett@worldvision.org.Connect with him here on LinkedIn over at hhttps://www.linkedin.com/in/scott-mcdiffett-746a6932/.

09What happens next?


Glad you asked. We owe you that and strive to not leave youin limbo. We review applications nearly every day assessing strength of fit for the role. Sometimes questions arise on our end so we message you to learn more. Short-listed candidates are contacted for an initial phone conversation with our recruiting staff. Moving deeper into our selection process you can expect to interview 1:1 with a hiring manager. Finalists normally participate in a panel interview where the opportunity to meet additional members of our staff lends itself to more of a 360-view of the role. Our most valuable resource is our talented staff. Our goal is to fill this vacancy with the right person in the shortest amount of time so we have allhands ondeck to move this important work forward.
